DOC.brief_summary: Due increase demand colonoscopy clinical practice , great interest recently renew unsedated colonoscopy . Both Carbon dioxide Insufflation ( CO2 ) Warm Water Infusion ( WWI ) advocate improve patient tolerance colonoscopy compare standard Air Insufflation ( AI ) . This study aim evaluate performance technique versus AI unsedated patient .
DOC.brief_title: Carbon Dioxide Insufflation ( CO2 ) Warm Water Infusion ( WWI ) Versus Standard Air Insufflation ( AI ) Unsedated Colonoscopy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria adult outpatient willing undergo colonoscopy without routine initial sedation refuse initiate colonoscopy without routine sedation inadequate bowel preparation incapacity give inform consent
